title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 443.4 - Supervision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 443.4 - Supervision

State Regulations

Supervision of children placed in foster homes is to be
maintained through the provision of casework contacts in accordance with
section
441.21
of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
443.4

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
